effect_entries.effect:
Held by []{pokemon:genesect}
:   Holder's buster is white, and its []{move:techno-blast} becomes []{type:ice}-type.
effect_entries.short_effect: Grants Genesect a white, Ice-type Techno Blast.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ゲノセクトに　持たせると
テクノバスターという　技が
こおりタイプになる　カセット。

A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Genesect’s Techno Blast
move so it becomes Ice type.

Modulo da dare a Genesect. Trasforma
Tecnobotto in una mossa di tipo Ghiaccio.

Una bonita esfera que potencia los movimientos
de tipo Dragón y Agua. Debe llevarla Palkia.

Gibt man es Genesect zum Tragen, wandelt es
den Typ der Attacke Techblaster in Eis um.

Tenu par Genesect, ce module change la
capacité TechnoBuster en une capacité de type
Glace.

게노세크트에게 지니게 하면
테크노버스터라는 기술이
얼음타입으로 바뀌는 카세트.

ゲノセクトに　もたせると
テクノバスターという　わざが
こおりタイプになる　カセット。

A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Techno Blast to an
Ice-type move.

A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Techno Blast to an
Ice-type move.

Tenu par Genesect, ce module
change la capacité TechnoBuster
en une capacité de type Glace.
